description: "This early 18th century map of Asia features a drawing of a woman burning offerings on an altar, while two children carry cornucopias, and a camel looks on. The Roman god Mercury descends from the sky in the background wearing his winged helmet."
label: "Nova tabula insularum Iavae, Sumatrae, Borneonis et aliarum Malaccam usque, delineata in insula Iava, ubi ad vivum designantur vada et brevia scopulique interjacentes descripta / G.M.A.L. = Neuwe vnd eijgentliche furbildung, der inseln, Java, Sumatra, Borneo, bis gen Malaca, mit alen vmligen den kleinen inseln, corect vnd mit gansem sleis in der insel Java observiert vnd / abgerissen durch G.M.A.L."
